info.description: An API exposing details of the treaties laid before Parliament.
info.title: Treaties API

parameters.description: Business item with the ID specified
parameters.name: id

schema.description: Business item with the ID specified

parameters.description: Treaties which contains the search text specified
parameters.name: SearchText

schema.description: Treaties which contains the search text specified

parameters.description: Treaties with the government organisation id specified
parameters.name: GovernmentOrganisationId

schema.description: Treaties with the government organisation id specified

parameters.description: Treaties with the series membership type specified
parameters.name: Series

parameters.description: Treaties where the parliamentary process is concluded or notconcluded
parameters.name: ParliamentaryProcess

parameters.description: Treaties which contain a scheduled debate
parameters.name: DebateScheduled

schema.description: Treaties which contain a scheduled debate

parameters.description: Treaties which contain a motion to not ratify
parameters.name: MotionToNotRatify

schema.description: Treaties which contain a motion to not ratify

parameters.description: Treaties which are recommended to not ratify
parameters.name: RecommendedNotRatify

schema.description: Treaties which are recommended to not ratify

parameters.description: Treaties which are laid in the specified house
parameters.name: House

parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0
parameters.name: Skip

schema.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0

parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 20
parameters.name: Take

schema.description: The number of records to return, default is 20

404.description: If the treaty can't be found

parameters.description: Business items belonging to treaty with the ID specified
parameters.name: id

schema.description: Business items belonging to treaty with the ID specified

200.description: The business items for the requested treaty

404.description: If the treaty cannot be found

get.summary: Returns business items belonging to the treaty with ID.
